00013 #define PLUGIN_CREATOR_H

00021 class PluginCreator {
00025     template <class F> class LoadFunctionHelper {
00026         public:
00027             static bool functionPresent(const QString &, QDialog *);
00028     };
00029 
00030     public:
00031         virtual ~PluginCreator() { }
00033         QString libraryName () { return LibraryName; }
00034 
00035     protected:
00036         virtual bool loadFunction() = 0;
00037         virtual bool functionPresent(const QString &) = 0;
00038         virtual void writeSource () = 0;
00039 
00040         bool loadFunction(const QString &, QDialog *);
00041         bool checkValidity(const QString &, const QString &, QDialog *);
00042 
00043         bool compile (QString);
00044         bool link (QString);
00045 
00046         QString LibraryName;
00047 };

00049 #include <dlfcn.h>
00050 #include <iostream>
00051 #include <QFile>
00052 #include <QMessageBox>
00053 
00061 template <class F>
00062         bool PluginCreator::LoadFunctionHelper<F>::functionPresent(
00063             const QString &libName, QDialog *parent) {
00064     void *handle;
00065     F *f;
00066     char *error;
00067 
00068     if (!QFile::exists (libName)) {
00069         QMessageBox::warning (parent, "Error opening library",
00070                               "Library does not exist: "+libName);
00071         std::cerr << "Library does not exist: "+libName.toStdString()
00072                   << std::endl;
00073         return false;
00074     }
00075 
00076     handle = dlopen (libName.toStdString().c_str(), RTLD_LAZY);
00077     if (!handle) {
00078         QMessageBox::warning (parent, "Error opening library", dlerror());
00079         return false;
00080     }
00081 
00082     f = (F *)dlsym(handle, "f");
00083 
00084     if (f == NULL) {
00085         if ((error = dlerror()) != NULL)  {
00086             QMessageBox::warning (parent, "Error finding function", error);
00087             abort ();
00088             return false;
00089         }
00090     }
00091 
00092     dlclose(handle);
00093 
00094     return true;
00095 }
00096 
00097 #endif
